Interface RemoteObservable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    BoardViewInterface, CharactersViewInterface, PlayerDashboardsViewInterface
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Board, BoardView, CharactersView, DominationBoard, ExecutableObject, GUIBoardView, GUICharactersView, GUIPlayerDashboardsView, Newton, Observable, Player, PlayerDashboardsView, PowerUp, Square, TagbackGrenade, TargetingScope, Teleporter, TUIBoardView, TUICharactersView, TUIPlayerDashboardsView, VirtualBoardView, VirtualCharactersView, VirtualPlayerDashboardsView, Weapon

    public interface RemoteObservable
extends java.rmi.Remote
    A remote object that can be observed.
